Major_Arcs.title: Early Comic Antics and Dinosaur Introduction
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the early comic style with standalone gags and the introduction of dinosaurs as everyday elements.

sub_scenes.title: The Clam Debt Trick
sub_scenes.description: Guz stages a fake drowning to get King Guz to repay a debt, showcasing Guz's cunning and comedic trickery in a self-contained narrative.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto Soreness and Age
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop encounters a dinosaur with clumsiness due to old age, presenting a humorous situation involving everyday dinosaur usage.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Shopping and Purchase
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the theme of dinosaur commerce, from considering trade-ins to the experience of buying a new dinosaur, highlighting the societal integration of dinosaurs.

sub_scenes.title: Considering a Trade-In
sub_scenes.description: Dinny and another man discuss the idea of trading in an old dinosaur model, setting up the theme of dinosaur replacement and market.

sub_scenes.title: Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership and Shopping
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to Honest Zog's dealership where dinosaurs are sold, showing customers browsing and the commercial aspect of dinosaurs.

narrative_arcs.title: Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership and Shopping

sub_scenes.title: The Zippy Dinosaur's Test Ride and Pinch
sub_scenes.description: A customer test-rides a dinosaur which turns out to be unexpectedly aggressive, pinching and throwing him off, adding a humorous but cautionary note to dinosaur shopping.

narrative_arcs.title: The Zippy Dinosaur's Test Ride and Pinch

sub_scenes.title: Concluding the Dinosaur Deal After Test Ride
sub_scenes.description: Despite a painful test ride, the customer is impressed by the dinosaur's speed and decides to purchase it, highlighting the allure of certain dinosaur features over comfort.

narrative_arcs.title: Concluding the Dinosaur Deal After Test Ride

sub_scenes.title: Farewell to Dinny and Departure
sub_scenes.description: A caveman bids farewell to Dinny, his old dinosaur, trading him in for a newer model, showing a sentimental but practical approach to dinosaur ownership.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny on Sale at the Dinosaur Dealership
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is shown for sale at the dealership, marked down and sold 'as is', completing the cycle of trade-in and resale in the dinosaur market.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinny on Sale at the Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Sales Pitch and Unpleasant Test Ride
sub_scenes.description: Another customer considers buying a dinosaur, experiencing a bumpy and uncomfortable test ride, mirroring the earlier test ride incident and highlighting risks in dinosaur purchasing.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Sales Pitch and Unpleasant Test Ride

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Unmasking and Recognition
sub_scenes.description: The bumpy dinosaur is revealed to be Dinny, unexpectedly back and causing trouble, connecting back to the previous Dinny storyline and adding a twist.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Return and Chaos
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dinny's unexpected and chaotic return, and the reactions of characters to his reappearance and uncontrolled behavior.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Defense and Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is mistreated and defended, then welcomed back with affection, showcasing emotional responses to his return and establishing protective sentiments.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Uncontrolled Return
sub_scenes.description: Dinny's return becomes chaotic and destructive as he crashes through trees, alarming other cavemen, highlighting the unpredictable nature of his reappearance.

Major_Arcs.title: Relationship Troubles and Fishing Trip
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores relationship dynamics and frustrations, set against the backdrop of a fishing trip, combining romantic rejection with everyday annoyances.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Alley invites Coola fishing but is rejected, initiating a conflict in their relationship and setting up emotional tension.

sub_scenes.title: Breakup and Dramatic Exit
sub_scenes.description: Coola firmly rejects Alley, leading to a dramatic breakup symbolized by a falling rock, emphasizing the finality of their separation.

sub_scenes.title: Misogynistic Musings on Women's Behavior
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen express generalized misogynistic sentiments about women's unpredictable behavior and demands, providing a commentary on gender relations.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Trip Annoyances: Baiting and Loud Talking
sub_scenes.description: Fishing trip annoyances are highlighted, including dramatic baiting and loud talking, showcasing everyday frustrations during communal activities.

narrative_arcs.title: Fishing Trip Annoyances: Baiting and Loud Talking

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Apology on the Fishing Trip
sub_scenes.description: Annoyances escalate into confrontation followed by an apology, resolving immediate tension and showing social dynamics within the fishing group.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Apology on the Fishing Trip

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Gossip and Misunderstandings
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers on romantic gossip, jealousy, and misunderstandings, leading to confrontations and misdirected violence, exploring the complexities of caveman romance.

sub_scenes.title: Gossip and Competition for Coola's Affections
sub_scenes.description: Gossip about competition for Coola's affections is introduced, setting up a scenario of romantic rivalry and potential conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Gossip and Competition for Coola's Affections

sub_scenes.title: Skepticism and the Challenge to Verify Coola's Loyalty
sub_scenes.description: Skepticism about the gossip leads to a challenge to verify Coola's loyalty, driving the narrative towards investigation and potential confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Skepticism and the Challenge to Verify Coola's Loyalty

sub_scenes.title: Misdirection and Admiration for Cherie
sub_scenes.description: The verification attempt leads to a scene of admiration for Cherie, possibly misdirecting the initial gossip and adding a layer of misunderstanding.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Confrontation and Physical Violence
sub_scenes.description: Jealousy erupts into physical violence as a muscular caveman confronts another man near a woman, escalating romantic tensions into physical conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Misdirected Aggression and a Name Revealed
sub_scenes.description: The aggression is revealed to be misdirected, as the muscular caveman meant to hit someone else, introducing confusion and the name 'Koko'.

narrative_arcs.title: Misdirected Aggression and a Name Revealed

sub_scenes.title: Affectionate Comfort and a Confused Realization
sub_scenes.description: Affection shown to Koko clarifies the romantic dynamics and leads to the muscular caveman's confused realization of his romantic rejection.

narrative_arcs.title: Affectionate Comfort and a Confused Realization

sub_scenes.title: Anger and Strategic Counsel
sub_scenes.description: Anger over romantic rejection is met with strategic counsel, suggesting cleverness over violence in winning affections, shifting the approach to romance.

sub_scenes.title: Defining Romance - Eloquently and Crudely
sub_scenes.description: Romance is defined through both elegant and vulgar terms, providing contrasting perspectives on romantic interactions and strategies.

sub_scenes.title: The 'French Fried Freak' Technique
sub_scenes.description: An unusual romantic technique, the 'French fried freak', is introduced, involving trailing and observing the woman, offering bizarre romantic advice.

sub_scenes.title: Rhyming Difficulty and Skeptical Contemplation
sub_scenes.description: Skeptical contemplation of the advice, focusing on the peculiarity of rhyming and the challenge of adopting the suggested romantic approach.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misadventures and Crocodile
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc continues to explore romantic misadventures, including jealousy, awkward gift-giving, and unexpected animal attacks, highlighting the chaotic nature of romance.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Offering and Jealousy
sub_scenes.description: A romantic flower offering triggers jealousy in another caveman, setting up a potential disruption of the romantic moment.

sub_scenes.title: Log Gift and Crocodile Attack
sub_scenes.description: An awkward log gift is interrupted by a sudden crocodile attack, adding unexpected danger and humor to the romantic attempt.

sub_scenes.title: Critique of Vulgarity and Subdued Crocodile
sub_scenes.description: The crocodile incident leads to a critique of vulgarity and a humorous resolution with a subdued crocodile, blending social commentary with slapstick.

narrative_arcs.title: Critique of Vulgarity and Subdued Crocodile

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Rage and Vengeful Kick
sub_scenes.description: Jealous rage manifests in a vengeful kick at a small animal, showing the destructive outlet of romantic frustration.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Interlude and Bewildered Onlooker
sub_scenes.description: A romantic interlude is observed with bewilderment by another caveman, highlighting the confusing nature of romance to outsiders.

sub_scenes.title: Insult and Demand for Explanation
sub_scenes.description: Verbal aggression and insults occur, demanding explanation and escalating tensions between cavemen, possibly over romantic or social slights.

sub_scenes.title: Misinterpreted Kiss and Protective Violence
sub_scenes.description: A friendly gesture is misinterpreted as aggression, leading to protective violence and highlighting the potential for miscommunication in social interactions.

sub_scenes.title: Public Accusation of Infidelity
sub_scenes.description: A public confrontation and accusation of infidelity, showcasing social shaming and relationship drama played out in public.

sub_scenes.title: Violent Retribution for Infidelity
sub_scenes.description: Physical violence as retribution for infidelity, demonstrating harsh social consequences for perceived romantic transgressions.

sub_scenes.title: Alley's Romantic Resolution and New Approach
sub_scenes.description: Alley resolves to become more romantic, adopting a new approach to relationships, indicating character development and attempted change.

narrative_arcs.title: Alley's Romantic Resolution and New Approach

sub_scenes.title: Male Commentary on Female Behavior
sub_scenes.description: Male commentary on female behavior provides a concluding, observational perspective on the preceding romantic events, reinforcing gender stereotypes and humor.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twist Dance Craze and Injuries
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes dance crazes, focusing on the unexpected and humorous consequences of a new dance called 'the twitch,' leading to widespread injuries.

sub_scenes.title: Consequences of the New Twist Dance
sub_scenes.description: Injuries from the 'New Twist' dance are revealed, highlighting the physical risks of following dance fads.

narrative_arcs.title: Consequences of the New Twist Dance

sub_scenes.title: Pressure to Participate in the Twitch Dance
sub_scenes.description: Social pressure to participate in the 'twitch' dance is shown, with Coola urging Alley to learn it for an upcoming party, illustrating social expectations around dance.

narrative_arcs.title: Pressure to Participate in the Twitch Dance

sub_scenes.title: Beginning of Dance Instruction
sub_scenes.description: Dance instruction begins as Alley agrees to teach Coola the 'twitch', setting up a learning process and potential comedic mishaps.

sub_scenes.title: Mishaps During Dance Practice
sub_scenes.description: Comedic mishaps occur during dance practice, highlighting Coola's clumsiness and adding humor to the learning process.

sub_scenes.title: Formal Lesson and Identity Reveal
sub_scenes.description: A formal dance lesson setting is introduced, culminating in the surprising reveal of Alley's true identity as Miss Glump, a significant plot twist.

sub_scenes.title: Nighttime Twitch Discussion and Mysterious Fear
sub_scenes.description: Nighttime discussion of 'the twitch' is abruptly interrupted by mysterious fear among cavemen, creating suspense and linking the dance to an unknown danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Nighttime Twitch Discussion and Mysterious Fear

sub_scenes.title: Humiliating Accusation of Ants
sub_scenes.description: Alley faces public humiliation with accusations of 'ants in yer pants', highlighting social mockery and discomfort related to the dance craze.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Ward Twitch Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: The widespread consequences of 'the twitch' are revealed in a hospital ward filled with injured cavemen, adding a darkly humorous and absurd outcome to the dance craze.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel and Spain Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces time travel as a plot device, sending Alley to Spain for a research mission, leading to cultural misunderstandings and comedic confrontations.

sub_scenes.title: Researching 16th Century Spain and the Time Machine Idea
sub_scenes.description: The need for research on 16th-century Spain is established, and the idea of using a time machine to get firsthand information is proposed, setting up the time travel premise.

narrative_arcs.title: Researching 16th Century Spain and the Time Machine Idea

sub_scenes.title: Preparing the Time Machine for Oop
sub_scenes.description: Preparation of the time machine to bring Oop to the present is shown, moving the plot towards time travel action.

narrative_arcs.title: Preparing the Time Machine for Oop

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Moonlight Scene with Alley and Ooola
sub_scenes.description: A romantic scene with Alley and Ooola in their own time, contrasting with the time machine preparations and setting up a personal moment before time travel.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Moonlight Scene with Alley and Ooola

sub_scenes.title: Arguing and Agreeing to a Kiss
sub_scenes.description: Alley and Ooola's argument about finally kissing after a long engagement, leading to a reluctant agreement, creating romantic anticipation.

narrative_arcs.title: Arguing and Agreeing to a Kiss

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Activation and Unexpected Transportation
sub_scenes.description: Time machine activation coincides with Alley and Ooola's kiss attempt, resulting in their unexpected transportation to the future, interrupting their romantic moment.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Machine Activation and Unexpected Transportation

sub_scenes.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spanish Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Arrival in the 20th century and introduction to Dr. Wonmug, who reveals the 'important assignment' in Spain, clarifying the purpose of their time travel.

narrative_arcs.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spanish Assignment

sub_scenes.title: Frustration over Interrupted Kiss and Justification for Time Travel
sub_scenes.description: Frustration over the interrupted kiss is expressed, and Dr. Wonmug justifies the time travel by explaining the importance of his research on medieval Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Frustration over Interrupted Kiss and Justification for Time Travel

sub_scenes.title: Postponed Kiss and Dispatch to Ancient Spain
sub_scenes.description: The kiss is postponed for the mission, and Alley is dispatched to ancient Spain, commencing the 'important assignment'.

narrative_arcs.title: Postponed Kiss and Dispatch to Ancient Spain

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in Spain and Initial Confusion
sub_scenes.description: Alley arrives in Spain and expresses initial confusion about his location and Dr. Wonmug's peculiar assignments.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Spain and Initial Confusion

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with an Angry Spaniard
sub_scenes.description: Alley is immediately confronted by an angry Spaniard, setting a hostile tone for his arrival and introducing cultural clash.

sub_scenes.title: The Serenade and the Annoyed Observer
sub_scenes.description: A serenade scene unfolds, with a serenader and an annoyed observer, providing a cultural backdrop and potential source of conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: The Serenade and the Annoyed Observer

sub_scenes.title: Rejection from the Balcony
sub_scenes.description: The serenade is rejected by the woman on the balcony, escalating the tension and setting up further conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Persistent Serenade and Escalating Frustration
sub_scenes.description: The serenader persists despite rejection, further frustrating the observer and building towards intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Alley's Intervention and Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: Alley intervenes in the serenade, misunderstanding the situation and leading to a direct confrontation with the serenader.

sub_scenes.title: Attack on the Serenader and Balcony Woman's Initial Reaction
sub_scenes.description: Alley attacks the serenader, and the balcony woman reacts to the commotion, showing initial consequences of Alley's intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Attack on the Serenader and Balcony Woman's Initial Reaction

sub_scenes.title: Accusation and Misunderstanding of Relationship
sub_scenes.description: The woman accuses Alley of attacking her boyfriend, revealing a relationship and deepening the misunderstanding.

sub_scenes.title: Woman's Assertive Declaration of Identity
sub_scenes.description: The woman asserts her identity, possibly to intimidate and command respect in the escalating conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Apology, Impending Consequences, and the Manager's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: An apology is given, but the arrival of Don Jose's manager suggests further consequences for Alley's actions, escalating the stakes.

narrative_arcs.title: Apology, Impending Consequences, and the Manager's Arrival

Major_Arcs.title: The Bullfight
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around a bullfight, from the urgent preparations and recruitment to the actual performance and its swift, unexpected conclusion.

sub_scenes.title: Urgency to Start the Bullfight and Crowd's Demand
sub_scenes.description: Urgency to start the bullfight is highlighted due to crowd impatience and a knocked-out bullfighter, creating immediate pressure to proceed.

narrative_arcs.title: Urgency to Start the Bullfight and Crowd's Demand

sub_scenes.title: Bullfighting Technique Discussion
sub_scenes.description: A discussion about bullfighting techniques, specifically a crude and quick method, sets the tone for the bullfight's approach.

sub_scenes.title: Recruitment Offer for Bullfight Participation
sub_scenes.description: A recruitment offer is made to participate in the bullfight, suggesting someone is needed to fill in, possibly Alley himself.

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight Commences Amidst Moral Conflict
sub_scenes.description: The bullfight commences amidst a brief moral conflict about animal cruelty, highlighting differing perspectives on the event.

sub_scenes.title: Spectator Commentary on Bullfighter's Appearance and Weapon Choice
sub_scenes.description: Spectator commentary provides humorous observations on the bullfighter's unusual appearance and weapon choice (stone-age axe).

narrative_arcs.title: Spectator Commentary on Bullfighter's Appearance and Weapon Choice

sub_scenes.title: Doubt and Reassurance about the Bullfighter's Courage
sub_scenes.description: Doubt about the bullfighter's courage is expressed by Don Jose, countered by reassurance, building suspense before the fight.

narrative_arcs.title: Doubt and Reassurance about the Bullfighter's Courage

sub_scenes.title: Swift Bullfight and Triumphant Outcome
sub_scenes.description: The bullfight is unexpectedly swift and triumphant, ending with the bullfighter knocking out the bull with a stone axe, resolving the bullfight narrative quickly.

Major_Arcs.title: Oop's Return and Kiss Denial
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Oop's return from Spain and a surprising twist: his unexpected denial of a promised kiss, creating mystery and relationship tension.

sub_scenes.title: Decision to Retrieve Oop for Information
sub_scenes.description: The decision to bring Oop back from the past to gather information is made, setting up his return and the mission's purpose.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Retrieve Oop for Information

sub_scenes.title: Courting Scene with Spanish Lady and Gentleman
sub_scenes.description: A brief, unrelated courting scene in a Spanish setting provides a comedic interlude before Oop's return.

narrative_arcs.title: Courting Scene with Spanish Lady and Gentleman

sub_scenes.title: Oop's Abduction and Jane's Relief at His Return
sub_scenes.description: Oop returns in a captured state, shocking Jane but also bringing relief at his safe return, creating mixed emotions.

narrative_arcs.title: Oop's Abduction and Jane's Relief at His Return

sub_scenes.title: Jane Reminds Oop of Promised Kiss
sub_scenes.description: Jane reminds Oop of a promised kiss, setting up romantic anticipation as a reward for his mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Jane Reminds Oop of Promised Kiss

sub_scenes.title: Oop's Unexpected Denial of Kiss and Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Oop unexpectedly denies the kiss and hints at a revelation, creating a cliffhanger and shifting the narrative from romance to mystery and potential conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Oop's Unexpected Denial of Kiss and Revelation

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and its Discontents
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the humorous reality of temporary power through the 'King for a Day' concept, revealing the unexpected downsides and manipulations.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day and the Reality of Throne Life
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to the 'King for a Day' concept and the initial humorous discomfort and challenges of temporary kingship.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day and the Reality of Throne Life

sub_scenes.title: King's Planned Absence and Temporary Replacement
sub_scenes.description: The 'King for a Day' decides to leave and appoints a temporary replacement, setting up a succession scenario and potential for chaos.

narrative_arcs.title: King's Planned Absence and Temporary Replacement

sub_scenes.title: Proclamation and Respect Demand for Temporary King
sub_scenes.description: The temporary king proclaims his departure and demands respect for his appointed replacement, setting expectations that are quickly subverted.

narrative_arcs.title: Proclamation and Respect Demand for Temporary King

sub_scenes.title: Reign of Rocks: The Temporary King's Downfall
sub_scenes.description: The temporary king's rule immediately fails as the crowd pelts him with rocks, highlighting the lack of real authority in temporary power.

narrative_arcs.title: Reign of Rocks: The Temporary King's Downfall

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and the Original King's Return
sub_scenes.description: The aftermath of the temporary king's downfall and the original king's return reveal a manipulative scheme behind the temporary kingship, adding a layer of political humor.

narrative_arcs.title: Aftermath and the Original King's Return

Major_Arcs.title: Guz's Substitution and Realization
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features Guz substituting for someone, experiencing the daily grind, and realizing why the original Guz needs frequent vacations.

sub_scenes.title: Guz's Misunderstood Leisure and Oompa's Ire
sub_scenes.description: Guz's attempt at leisure is misunderstood and interrupted by Oompa's anger, revealing the demands of his substituted role.

narrative_arcs.title: Guz's Misunderstood Leisure and Oompa's Ire

sub_scenes.title: Guz's Tub Contemplation and Vacation Insight
sub_scenes.description: Guz reflects on his experience and understands why the original Guz needs vacations, providing a humorous insight into the pressures of the role.

narrative_arcs.title: Guz's Tub Contemplation and Vacation Insight

Major_Arcs.title: Disputes and Royal Wisdom
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc showcases various disputes and how royal figures, including a wise elder, intervene to resolve conflicts, often with humorous or pragmatic outcomes.

sub_scenes.title: Accusation of Cheating in a Game
sub_scenes.description: An accusation of cheating in a game sets up a minor dispute, illustrating everyday conflicts in their society.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Cheating in a Game

sub_scenes.title: Money Fight and Royal Intervention
sub_scenes.description: A physical fight over money is observed and judged by a crowned figure, showing royal intervention in common disputes.

sub_scenes.title: The Mystery of the Missing Clams and Royal Inquiry
sub_scenes.description: A mystery over missing clams and a royal inquiry into the dispute, setting up a problem to be solved through royal wisdom.

narrative_arcs.title: The Mystery of the Missing Clams and Royal Inquiry

sub_scenes.title: Royal Deduction and Wise Elder Intervention in the Clam Dispute
sub_scenes.description: Royal deduction leads to realizing the clams are the king's, and a wise elder is brought in to mediate the dispute.

narrative_arcs.title: Royal Deduction and Wise Elder Intervention in the Clam Dispute

sub_scenes.title: Wise Elder's Resolution: 'Nothing Left to Fight About'
sub_scenes.description: The wise elder resolves the clam dispute by declaring the clams are gone, ending the conflict through a pragmatic approach.

narrative_arcs.title: Wise Elder's Resolution: 'Nothing Left to Fight About'

Major_Arcs.title: Moonina Palace Racket and Dinner
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc takes place in 'Moonina Palace' and focuses on investigating a disturbance, revealing financial impropriety, and a humorous dinner scene with health concerns and sudden violence.

sub_scenes.title: Investigating the Racket Outside
sub_scenes.description: Investigation of a racket outside 'Moonina Palace' leads to discovering cavemen fighting, setting up events within the palace.

sub_scenes.title: Accusation of Money Keeping
sub_scenes.description: Accusation of money keeping against the guard/advisor, revealing corruption or shrewdness within the palace.

sub_scenes.title: Dinner and Ulcer Warning
sub_scenes.description: A dinner scene where a lavish meal leads to an ulcer warning and dietary restrictions for the crowned caveman, blending humor with health concerns.

sub_scenes.title: Unpleasant Dinner and Regret
sub_scenes.description: The unpleasant dinner continues with dietary restrictions leading to regret about becoming king, highlighting the downsides of power.

sub_scenes.title: Surprise Attack
sub_scenes.description: A playful moment turns violent with a surprise attack, dramatically shifting the tone and relationship between the characters.

Major_Arcs.title: Apologies and New Rulership
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on apologies between Guz and Oompah, the former king's relief at losing power, and a new offer of rulership to a young caveman.

sub_scenes.title: Apologies and Job Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Apologies are exchanged between Guz and Oompah, resolving past conflicts and leading to Oompah's rejection of Guz's job, showing resolution and aversion to responsibility.

sub_scenes.title: Freedom from Kingship
sub_scenes.description: The former crowned king expresses relief at being free from kingship, highlighting the burden of power and the joy of ordinary life.

sub_scenes.title: Offer of Rulership
sub_scenes.description: An offer of rulership is made to a young caveman, setting up a new potential leader and a shift in power dynamics.

sub_scenes.title: Measuring with a Board and Strange Duck
sub_scenes.description: A brief comedic interlude involving measuring with a board and the appearance of 'Strange Duck', providing light humor and a break from the main narratives.

narrative_arcs.title: Measuring with a Board and Strange Duck

Major_Arcs.title: The Barberous Act
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Barberous Act,' revealing it to be a forced shaving service, and explores its societal context within 'Moo Tonsorial Parlor'.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to the Barberous Act
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to the prophecy and setup for 'The Barberous Act', creating initial mystery and anticipation.

sub_scenes.title: Ooola's Interruption
sub_scenes.description: Ooola's interruption and the bearded man's sudden departure, hinting at the act about to be revealed.

sub_scenes.title: The Forced Shave
sub_scenes.description: The 'Barberous Act' is revealed as a forced and unpleasant shave, clarifying the mystery and introducing discomfort.

sub_scenes.title: Moo Tonsorial Parlor
sub_scenes.description: 'Moo Tonsorial Parlor' is introduced, showing the 'Barberous Act' as a commercial service, normalized and in demand despite its nature.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Malfunction
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the narrative by revisiting the time machine plotline, showcasing a malfunction that leads to unexpected consequences and sets up future storylines.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Setup and Expectation
sub_scenes.description: Time machine setup and the inventor's expectation of bringing Oop to the present, initiating the time travel experiment again.

sub_scenes.title: Materialization and Unexpected Visitor
sub_scenes.description: Materialization occurs, but unexpectedly brings a Roman Centurion instead of Oop, creating a humorous and significant malfunction.

sub_scenes.title: Reaction and Realization of Malfunction
sub_scenes.description: The inventor reacts with surprise and realizes the time machine malfunctioned, resolving to fix it and setting up potential future time travel adventures.
